name: Dress Up and Makeup: Manicure - Nail Salon Games 1
name_original: Dress Up and Makeup: Manicure - Nail Salon Games 1
description:
Dress Up and Makeup: Manicure™ is the best manicure app in the app store!!! Clip, buff, polish, decorate your nails and much more! Now with sparkling gems!!
Manicure virtual nails like a real nail salon! Start by choosing a skin tone, trimming your nails with realistic nail clippers, and buffing to a squeaky high shine. Then choose from loads of polish color collections to custom paint gorgeous nails. Let your inner nail artist out! Choose from absolutely tons of sparkling rhinestones, crystals, diamonds, gemstones, stickers, decals, hearts, flowers, fruit and much much more to decorate your nails. Once you are happy with your creations, save your nails to your album, or share!
Clean up with nail polish remover and start all over!
From the creators of the original Dress Up and Makeup™ series of apps, Dress Up and Makeup: Manicure™ for iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad, takes makeover games to a whole new level!

FEATURES:

Seven different skintones
Realistic nail clippings
Realistic sounds
Nail growth formula
Nail buffer for shine
Apply custom polish by painting
Four nail polish color collections
Nail art pens
Ten gems/decals collections
Save to camera roll/nail album
Share on Facebook
Email

Current Polish Collections Include:

Classic Reds, Pinks, Purples and Blues
Pastel Polishes
Grunge/Dark Colors
Brights/Neon Glow
Bonus: Pastel Nail Art Pens
Nail Gloss, Gel nails, french manicure
Glitter nail polishes
Glitter nail art pens
"Real Glitter" polishes

Current Gems Collections Include:

NEW ANIMATED Gems
Animated Crystals and crystal rings
Classic Rhinestones
Luxury Crystals, Diamonds, and Gemstones
Stickers and Decals
Objects, including Hearts, Pearls, Flowers, and Fruit
NEW Glitter Decals
Music, notes
Candy, cookies and sweets
Rings - silver, gold, plastic, glitter
Paint Splatters
Mani/Pedi
Flowers, hearts
Water bubble tips with hearts, stars and more!!
Gel nails and gel pens
French manicure tips
Wedding nails
Princess nails
Salon nails and spa nails
Glow Nails
Glitter Nails
Nail Salon Art
Unlock all gems for FREE!

Decorate your nails like a celebrity on the red carpet!! Hundreds of polish and gem styles for you to design your mani with! Everything from crystals to flowers, hearts, decals and more.

Free polishes and make up items added with every update!

Become a fan of Dress Up and Makeup: Manicure™ on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/MoreNailsApp

Download Dress Up and Makeup: Manicure™ for Free now to enjoy a sparkly new manicure any time!
